summary: This script takes command-line arguments, prints the first argument twice, and then loops through the remaining arguments printing them out. It also includes some explicit language and humoristic remarks in its comments.

details.comment: This script takes command-line arguments, prints the first argument twice, and then loops through the remaining arguments printing them out. It also includes some explicit language and humoristic remarks in its comments.
details.content:
<?php
//you should start from 1
//the number 0 stands for the script's name.
echo "$argv[1]\n";
echo "$argv[1]\n";
//what if i do not want to write the fucking semicolon?
//now you die.
//you should respect your fucking name.
echo "$argc\n";
//the fucking number is the index number plus one.
//$the_fucking_final_index_fucked_numer=$argc-1;
for ($i = 1; $i < $argc; $i++) {
	echo $argv[$i];
	//no need to put the fucking return at the fucking fucked end.
	//this will print #1 to #2 arg
	//i ain't know nothing about the $argv
}
//WTF R U THINKING?
?>
